Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose with which Day Spider-Hog skin you wanna play as!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Which Jumpball do you wanna play with?
The main suit for the mod, it's also alternatively named ''The Forward Suit''
The main suit but without his mask!
Made by the great PotterAndMatrixFan a long time ago for his mod Spider-Hog Generations! This is the latest version of the suit made 7 years ago.
Spider-Hog donning a classic-styled Spider-Man suit!
The main suit but in a Cherry and Black colour scheme instead of Blue and Red.
Stealth The Hedgehog from the Archie Comics. This is also inspired by the great @codetrillogy on Twitter/X!
Jumpball from the main game but edited to fit Spider-Hog.
Made by the great StarlightDX on GameBanana! Give it a download if you wanna play with this jumpball as normal Sonic, the mod is called ''Preview / Beta Spinball''.
This is for Stealth The Hedgehog skin type! You're allowed to use it for normal Spider-Hog but it's not recommended. It uses the normal textures from the game.
This is for Stealth The Hedgehog skin type! You're allowed to use it for normal Spider-Hog but it's not recommended. It uses the normal textures from StarlightDX's ''Preview / Beta Spinball'' mod.
